meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a gangster.
meanings.sent1: The man wore a gangsterish hat and sunglasses.
meanings.sent2: Her gangsterish outfit made her look tough.
meanings.sent3: He tried to act gangsterish by wearing oversized clothes.
meanings.sent4: The dark alley had a gangsterish vibe to it.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned building had a gangsterish feel, with broken windows and graffiti.

meanings.definition: Behaving in a manner typical of a gangster.
meanings.sent1: The group of friends acted gangsterish by talking tough.
meanings.sent2: She adopted a gangsterish attitude when dealing with the situation.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to look gangsterish by puffing up its fur.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered in a gangsterish manner, ready to unleash their fury.
meanings.sent5: The old car had a gangsterish charm, with its sleek lines and shiny chrome.
